hihi {{id}} {{items.id}}
Total {{items.totalPrice | currency}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from '../models/product'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'] }) export class CartComponent { // when components load, get cart from local storage items = this.getCart(); constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } // get cart from local storage getCart() { let cart = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart') || '{}'); console.log(cart); return cart; } }
